query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}};  q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id', first('Account.Name') as 'AccountName', first('Name') as 'Name', first('Owner.Name') as 'OwnerName', first('ForecastCategory') as 'ForecastCategory', abs(daysBetween(toDate(('CreatedDate_Year' + "-" +'CreatedDate_Month' + "-" + 'CreatedDate_Day'), "yyyy-MM-dd"),now())) as 'CreatedDate' ,first('CloseDate') as 'CloseDate', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}';q = order q by 'CreatedDate' asc; q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate 'Id', first('AccountName') as 'AccountName', first('Name') as 'Name',first('CloseDate') as 'CloseDate', first('Id') as 'Opportunity.Id', first('OwnerName') as 'OwnerName', first('CreatedDate') as 'DaysBetween', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}'; srcTask = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}"; srcTask = filter srcTask by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; srcTask = filter srcTask by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}};  srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Id',('Opportunity.Id') as 'Opportunity.Id',('Opportunity.Account.Name') as 'AccountName',('Owner.Name') as 'OwnerName',('TaskSubtype') as 'TaskSubtype', abs(daysBetween(toDate(('LastModifiedDate_Year') + "-" +('LastModifiedDate_Month') + "-" +('LastModifiedDate_Day'),"yyyy-MM-dd"),now())) as 'LastModifiedDt';srcTask = order srcTask by 'LastModifiedDt' asc; srcTask = group srcTask by 'Id'; srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Id', first('AccountName') as 'AccountName', first('Opportunity.Id') as 'Opportunity.Id', first('OwnerName') as 'OwnerName', first('TaskSubtype') as 'TaskSubtype', first('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcEvent = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; srcEvent = filter srcEvent by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; srcEvent = filter srcEvent by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}}; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Id', ('Opportunity.Id') as 'Opportunity.Id', ('Opportunity.Account.Name') as 'AccountName', ('Owner.Name') as 'OwnerName', "Meeting" as 'TaskSubtype', abs(daysBetween(toDate(first('LastModifiedDate_Year') + "-" + ('LastModifiedDate_Month') + "-" + ('LastModifiedDate_Day'),"yyyy-MM-dd"),now())) as 'LastModifiedDt'; srcEvent = order srcEvent by 'LastModifiedDt' asc; srcEvent = group srcEvent by 'Id'; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Id', first('AccountName') as 'AccountName', first('Opportunity.Id') as 'Opportunity.Id', first('OwnerName') as 'OwnerName', first('TaskSubtype') as 'TaskSubtype', first('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcActivity = union srcTask,srcEvent; srcActivity = order srcActivity by 'DaysBetween' asc; srcActivity = group srcActivity by 'Id'; srcActivity = foreach srcActivity generate 'Id' as 'activityId', first('Opportunity.Id') as 'Id', first('AccountName') as 'AccountName', first('OwnerName') as 'OwnerName', first('TaskSubtype') as 'TaskSubtype', first('DaysBetween') as 'DaysBetween'; srcActiOppty = cogroup q by ('AccountName','Id') left ,srcActivity by ('AccountName','Id') ; srcActiOppty = foreach srcActiOppty generate q['AccountName'] as 'Account.Name', q['Id'] as 'Id', first(q['Name']) as 'Name', first(q['OwnerName']) as 'Owner.Name',first(q['CloseDate']) as 'CloseDate', sum(q['sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}']) as '${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}', (case when min(srcActivity['DaysBetween']) >= 0 then min(srcActivity['DaysBetween']) else  first(q['DaysBetween']) end) as 'last_activity'; srcActiOppty = order srcActiOppty by {{no_quote(value(selection(step_hbar_group)))}};

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = foreach q generate (case when {{value(results(pct_diff_open_won))- 0 || 0}} > 0 then "Green" when {{value(results(pct_diff_open_won))- 0 || 0}} < 0 then  "Red" when ({{value(results(Amount_11))- 0 || 0}} > 0 and  {{value(results(Amount_12))- 0 || 0}} == 0 )then "Red"else "Gray" end) as 'RAG',  0.1 as 'count';q = limit q 1;
q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate  1-({{value(results(Id_16)) - 0 || 0}} /{{value(results(Id_15))- 0 || 0}}) as 'avg_pct_diff_comp_acty';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false"; q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id', first('Account.Name') as 'AccountName', first('Name') as 'Name', first('Owner.Name') as 'OwnerName', first('ForecastCategoryName') as 'ForecastCategoryName', first('StageName') as StageName, first('${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}',first('${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}', first('${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}', first('${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}', first('${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}', first('${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}', first('${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' , first('Owner.Role.Name') as 'Owner.Role.Name', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', first('CloseDate') as 'CloseDate', abs(daysBetween(toDate(('CreatedDate_Year' + "-" +'CreatedDate_Month' + "-" + 'CreatedDate_Day'), "yyyy-MM-dd"),now())) as 'CreatedDate', first('CloseDate_Year') as 'CloseDate_Year', first('CloseDate_Month') as 'CloseDate_Month', first('CloseDate_Day') as 'CloseDate_Day', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}';q = filter q by 'Id' in {{ selection(inactive_monitoring) }};q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}}; q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = group q by ('Id','Name', 'ForecastCategoryName'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id',first('CreatedDate') as 'DaysBetween','Name' as 'Name', 'ForecastCategoryName' as 'ForecastCategoryName', first('CloseDate') as 'CloseDate', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}',count() as 'count'; srcTask = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}"; srcTask = filter srcTask by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' =="false"; srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Id', abs(daysBetween(toDate('LastModifiedDate_Year' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Month' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Day',"yyyy-MM-dd"),now() ))as 'LastModifiedDt'; srcTask = group srcTask by 'Id'; srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcEvent = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; srcEvent = filter srcEvent by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' =="false"; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Id', abs(daysBetween(toDate('LastModifiedDate_Year' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Month' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Day',"yyyy-MM-dd"),now() ))as 'LastModifiedDt'; srcEvent = group srcEvent by 'Id'; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcActi = union srcTask,srcEvent; srcActi = group srcActi by 'Id'; srcActi = foreach srcActi generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('DaysBetween') as 'DaysBetween'; srcTaskOppty = cogroup q by 'Id' left ,srcActi by 'Id'; srcTaskOppty = foreach srcTaskOppty generate q['Id'] as 'Id', first(q['Name']) as 'Name', first(q['ForecastCategoryName']) as 'ForecastCategoryName', sum(q['sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}']) as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}' , (case when min(srcActi['DaysBetween']) >= 0 then min(srcActi['DaysBetween']) else  first(q['DaysBetween']) end) as 'sum_last_activity'; srcTaskOppty = order srcTaskOppty by 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}' desc; srcTaskOppty = limit srcTaskOppty {{value(selection(topSelector))}};

values.display: Days Since Last Activity - High to Low
Days Since Last Activity - Low to High

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["10 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"]; q = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}','Opportunity.CloseDate_Month','Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current month"];q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == "true"; eOpen = group q by 'Opportunity.Id'; eOpen = foreach eOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',count() as 'ActiCount'; eOpen = group eOpen by 'Opportunity.Id'; eOpen = foreach eOpen generate   'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as  'ActiCount'; q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == "true"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}','Opportunity.CloseDate_Month','Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current month"]; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; tOpen = group q by 'Opportunity.Id'; tOpen = foreach tOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',count() as 'ActiCount'; tOpen = group tOpen by 'Opportunity.Id'; tOpen = foreach tOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as 'ActiCount'; openActi = union eOpen,tOpen; openActi = group openActi by 'Opportunity.Id'; openActi = foreach openActi generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as 'ActiCount';openActi = group openActi by all; openActi = foreach openActi generate sum('ActiCount') as 'sum_WonActiCount';
q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate 1-({{value(results(Amount_11)) - 0 || 0}} / {{value(results(Amount_12))- 0 || 0}}) as 'avg_pct_diff_open_won';

SRC = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}";SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; SRC = foreach SRC generate 'ActivityDate' as 'ActivityDate' , (case when date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["3 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"] then "true" else "false" end) as 'IsClosed'; OWN= group SRC by 'IsClosed'; OWN = foreach OWN generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed', count() as 'count'; SRC1 = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}"; SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; OWN1 = group SRC1 by 'IsClosed'; OWN1 = foreach OWN1 generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed',count() as 'count'; ACTI = union OWN,OWN1; ACTI = group ACTI by all; allCount = foreach ACTI generate  sum('count') as 'nCount' , 0 as 'dCount'; SRC = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}";SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; SRC = foreach SRC generate 'ActivityDate' as 'ActivityDate' , (case when date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["3 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"] then "true" else "false" end) as 'IsClosed'; SRC = group SRC by 'IsClosed'; SRC = filter SRC by 'IsClosed' == "true" ; OWN = foreach SRC generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed', count() as 'count'; SRC1 = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}";SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'IsClosed' == "true"; SRC1 = group SRC1 by 'IsClosed'; OWN1 = foreach SRC1 generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed',count() as 'count'; ACTI = union OWN,OWN1; ACTI = group ACTI by all; ACTI = foreach ACTI generate 0 as 'nCount',sum('count') as 'dCount'; pctAllcount = union allCount,ACTI; pctAllcount = group pctAllcount by all ; pctAllcount = foreach pctAllcount generate sum('dCount')/sum('nCount') as 'sum_pctAb';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false";q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}}; q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}',count() as 'count'; q = group q by all; openopps = foreach q generate sum('count') as 'count';

('TaskSubtype', 'Status');wonopptyab = foreach allActi generate 'TaskSubtype' as 'ActivityType', 'Status' as 'Status', sum('ActiCount') as 'avg_activities_completed';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.pipeline_trending.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'OpportunityId' in {{results(Id_84)}};q = filter q by 'OpportunityId' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}};q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}','Opportunity.CloseDate_Month','Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' == "false"; q = filter q by 'StagePrev.IsClosed' == "false"; a = foreach q generate 'Id', "Open" as 'Status', 'OpportunityId', (CreatedDate_sec_epoch - CreatedDatePrev_sec_epoch)/86400 as 'diff', 'StageNamePrev' as 'StageName', 'Stage.IsClosed'; a = filter a by 'StageName' is not null; b = foreach q generate 'Id', 'OpportunityId', daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_Day + "-" + CreatedDate_Month + "-" + CreatedDate_Year, "dd-MM-yyyy"), now()) as 'diff', 'StageName', 'Stage.IsClosed', 'CreatedDate'; b = order b by 'CreatedDate' asc; b = group b by 'OpportunityId'; b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId', "Open" as 'Status', last('Id') as 'Id', last('diff') as 'diff', last('StageName') as 'StageName', last('Stage.IsClosed') as 'Stage.IsClosed'; b = filter b by 'Stage.IsClosed' == "false"; c = union a, b; c = group c by ('StageName', 'Status'); c = foreach c generate 'StageName', 'Status', coalesce(sum('diff')/{{value(results(open_opps))-0 || 0}},0) as 'avg_days_in_stage'; q2 = load "${App.EdgeMarts.pipeline_trending.Alias}"; q2 = filter q2 by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year${Constants.Fiscal_Postfix}','Opportunity.CloseDate_Month','Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current month"]; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}};q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q2 = filter q2 by 'Opportunity.IsWon' == "true"; q2 = filter q2 by 'StagePrev.IsClosed' == "false"; c2 = foreach q2 generate 'Id', "Won" as 'Status', 'OpportunityId', (CreatedDate_sec_epoch - CreatedDatePrev_sec_epoch)/86400 as 'diff', 'StageNamePrev' as 'StageName', 'Stage.IsClosed'; c2 = filter c2 by 'StageName' is not null; c2 = group c2 by ('StageName', 'Status'); c2 = foreach c2 generate 'StageName', 'Status', coalesce(sum('diff')/{{value(results(all_10)) - 0 || 0}},0) as 'avg_days_in_stage'; d = union c,c2; d = group d by ('StageName', 'Status'); d = foreach d generate 'StageName', 'Status', round(sum('avg_days_in_stage')) as 'avg_days_in_stage';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = filter q by 'IsWon' =="true";q = filter q by 'Id' in {{selection(Name_81)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}};q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}};q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current month"];q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}};q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate count() as 'count';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = foreach q generate (case when {{value(results(pct_diff_comp_acty))- 0 || 0}} > 0 then "Green" when {{value(results(pct_diff_comp_acty)) - 0 || 0}} < 0 then "Red" when ({{value(results(Id_16))- 0 || 0}} > 0 and  {{value(results(Id_15))- 0 || 0}} == 0 )then "Red" else "Gray" end) as 'RAG',  0.1 as 'count';q = limit q 1;
q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; q = foreach q generate round({{value(results(completedActyWonOpp))- 0 || 0}}/{{value(results(all_10))- 0 || 0}}) as 'avg_comp_act';
q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; id15 = foreach q generate round(({{value(results(completedActyOpenOpp))- 0 || 0}}/{{value(results(open_opps))- 0 || 0}})) as 'avg_comp_act';
q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = foreach q generate 1 -({{value(results(Amount_14))- 0 || 0}} / {{value(results(Amount_13))- 0 || 0}}) as 'sum_pct_diff_sale_cyc';

SRC = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}";SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}}; SRC = foreach SRC generate 'ActivityDate' as 'ActivityDate' , (case when date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["3 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"] then "true" else "false" end) as 'IsClosed';OWN= group SRC by 'IsClosed'; OWN = foreach OWN generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed', count() as 'count'; SRC1 = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}";SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}}; OWN1 = group SRC1 by 'IsClosed'; OWN1 = foreach OWN1 generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed',count() as 'count'; ACTI = union OWN,OWN1; ACTI = group ACTI by 'IsClosed'; ACTI = foreach ACTI generate 'IsClosed' as 'IsClosed' , sum('count') as 'count'; ACTI = order ACTI by 'count' desc;

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false"; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}}; q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = group q by ('Id','Name'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id','Name' as 'Name', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}',count() as 'count'; srcTask = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}"; srcTask = filter srcTask by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' =="false"; srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Id', abs(daysBetween(toDate('LastModifiedDate_Year' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Month' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Day',"yyyy-MM-dd"),now() ))as 'LastModifiedDt'; srcTask = group srcTask by 'Id'; srcTask = foreach srcTask generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcEvent = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}"; srcEvent = filter srcEvent by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' =="false"; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Id', abs(daysBetween(toDate('LastModifiedDate_Year' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Month' + "-" + 'LastModifiedDate_Day',"yyyy-MM-dd"),now() ))as 'LastModifiedDt'; srcEvent = group srcEvent by 'Id'; srcEvent = foreach srcEvent generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('LastModifiedDt') as 'DaysBetween'; srcActi = union srcTask,srcEvent; srcActi = group srcActi by 'Id'; srcActi = foreach srcActi generate 'Id' as 'Id',min('DaysBetween') as 'DaysBetween'; srcTaskOppty = cogroup q by 'Id' left,srcActi by 'Id'; srcTaskOppty = foreach srcTaskOppty generate q['Id'] as 'Id', first(q['Name']) as 'Name', sum(q['sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}']) as 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}' , min(srcActi['DaysBetween']) as 'sum_last_activity'; srcTaskOppty = order srcTaskOppty by 'sum_${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}' desc; scatterPlt = limit srcTaskOppty {{value(selection(topSelector))}};

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = foreach q generate (case when {{value(results(pct_diff_sale_cyc))- 0 || 0}} > 0 then "Red" when {{value(results(pct_diff_sale_cyc)) - 0 || 0}} < 0 then "Green" when ({{value(results(Amount_14))- 0 || 0}} > 0 and  {{value(results(Amount_13))- 0 || 0}} == 0 )then "Green"else "Gray" end) as 'RAG',  0.1 as 'count';q = limit q 1;

SRC = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}";SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC = filter SRC by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}}; SRC = foreach SRC generate 'ActivityDate' as 'ActivityDate' , (case when  date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["3 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"] then "true" else "false" end) as 'IsClosed';OWN= group SRC by 'IsClosed';SRC = filter SRC by 'IsClosed' in  {{selection(open_oppty_ab_close_open)}}; OWN= group SRC by all; OWN = foreach OWN generate  "Meeting" as 'ActivityType', count() as 'count'; SRC1 = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}";SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring,'Opportunity.Id')}}; SRC1 = filter SRC1 by 'IsClosed' in {{selection(open_oppty_ab_close_open)}};OWN1 = group SRC1 by 'TaskSubtype'; OWN1 = foreach OWN1 generate 'TaskSubtype' as 'ActivityType',count() as 'count'; ACTI = union OWN,OWN1; ACTI = group ACTI by 'ActivityType'; ACTI = foreach ACTI generate 'ActivityType' as 'ActivityType' , sum('count') as 'count'; openopptyab = order ACTI by 'count' desc;

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = filter q by 'IsWon' =="true";q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in  ["12 months ago".."current month"];q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}};q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate round(coalesce((sum('CloseDate_day_epoch') - sum('CreatedDate_day_epoch'))/{{value(results(all_10))- 0 || 0}},0))  as 'avg_sale_cycle_closed';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false"; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(Id_84)}};q = filter q by 'Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; q = filter q by 'Id' in {{selection(Name_81)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}}; q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id', round( (abs(daysBetween(toDate(first('CreatedDate_Year') + "-" + first('CreatedDate_Month') + "-" + first('CreatedDate_Day'),"yyyy-MM-dd"),now())))/1,0)  as 'SaleCycle'; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('SaleCycle') as 'avg_sale_cycle_won';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = filter q by 'IsClosed' =="false";q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q = filter q by 'ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}};q = filter q by 'StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}};q=filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in {{selection(CloseDate_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}};q =foreach q generate 'Id'+"~~~"+'Name'+"~~~"+'ForecastCategoryName' as 'IdName','Id' as 'Id','${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}' as '${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}';q = filter q by 'Id' in {{results(open_oppty)}}; q = filter q by 'IdName' in {{selection(open_oppty)}};q = group q by 'Id'; q = foreach q generate 'Id' as 'Id', sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}') as '${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}',count() as 'count';q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}')/{{value(results(open_opps))- 0 || 0}}  as 'avg_selling_price';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.opportunity.Alias}";q = filter q by 'IsWon' =="true";q = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year','CloseDate_Month','CloseDate_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current month"];q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}};q = filter q by '${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}};q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}};q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate (sum('${Variables.Opportunity_Amount.fieldName}')/{{value(results(all_10))- 0 || 0}})  as 'avg_selling_price';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.event.Alias}";q = filter q by 'Opportunity.ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}};q = filter q by 'Opportunity.StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}};q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',(case when date('ActivityDate_Year','ActivityDate_Month','ActivityDate_Day') in ["3 ${Constants.Fiscal_Prefix}years ago".."current day"] then "true" else "false" end) as 'IsClosed'; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true"; eOpen = group q by 'Opportunity.Id'; eOpen = foreach eOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',count() as 'ActiCount'; eOpen = group eOpen by 'Opportunity.Id'; eOpen = foreach eOpen generate   'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as  'ActiCount'; q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.task.Alias}";q = filter q by 'Opportunity.ForecastCategoryName' in {{selection(ForecastCategoryName_79)}};q = filter q by 'Opportunity.StageName' in {{selection(StageName_80)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{results(Id_84)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.Id' in {{selection(inactive_monitoring)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Bookings.fieldName}' in {{selection(Type_82)}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "true";q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Type_75)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Customer_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Customer_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(Account_Industry_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography.fieldName}' in {{selection(country_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Geography_L2.sobjectName}.${Variables.Geography_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(state_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source.sobjectName}.${Variables.Source.fieldName}' in {{selection(source_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.${Variables.Source_L2.fieldName}' in {{selection(LeadSource_Pl)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Role.Name' in {{selection(Owner_RoleNames_77)}}; q = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(Owner_Name_78)}}; tOpen = group q by 'Opportunity.Id'; tOpen = foreach tOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',count() as 'ActiCount'; tOpen = group tOpen by 'Opportunity.Id'; tOpen = foreach tOpen generate 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as 'ActiCount'; openActi = union eOpen,tOpen; openActi = group openActi by 'Opportunity.Id'; openActi = foreach openActi generate 'Opportunity.Id' as 'Opportunity.Id',sum('ActiCount') as 'ActiCount';openActi = group openActi by all; openActiid15 = foreach openActi generate sum('ActiCount') as 'sum_ActiCount',count() as 'sum_Oppty',sum('ActiCount')/count() as 'avg_comp_act_open';
